trans-unit.source: Represents a mask-parsing service that can be used by any number of controls that support masking, such as the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 表示可由任意数量的屏蔽，如支持的控件的掩码分析服务<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox> control contains a mask, composed of literal characters and formatting elements, that it tests all user input against.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox>控件包含掩码，组成原义字符和格式设置，它测试针对的所有用户输入元素。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox>

trans-unit.source: Instead of permanently associating a specific mask-parsing engine with <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox>, Windows Forms provides it as a separate service, represented by the MaskedTextProvider class, which defines the syntax of the masking language discussed in the documentation for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.Mask%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 而不是永久关联与特定掩码分析引擎<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox>，Windows 窗体提供它作为单独的服务，由 MaskedTextProvider 类，该类定义的文档中讨论的屏蔽语言的语法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.Mask%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.Mask%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox>

trans-unit.source: Many of the members of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox> class refer their implementation to similarly named members of the associated MaskedTextProvider.
trans-unit.target: 成员的许多<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox>类，请参阅它们的关联 MaskedTextProvider 同样命名成员的实现。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox>

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.PromptChar%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox> class refers all access to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.PromptChar%2A> of the MaskedTextProvider class.
trans-unit.target: 例如，该<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.PromptChar%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox>类引用对<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.PromptChar%2A>的 MaskedTextProvider 类</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.PromptChar%2A>的所有访问</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox></xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.PromptChar%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The mask-parsing engine used by MaskedTextProvider is modeled after the Masked Edit control included in Microsoft Visual Basic version 6.
trans-unit.target: 后 Masked Edit 控件包含在 Microsoft Visual Basic 版本 6 建模 MaskedTextProvider 由使用的掩码分析引擎。

trans-unit.source: Its masking language is described in the documentation for the <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Mask%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 中的文档介绍了其屏蔽语言<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Mask%2A>属性。</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Mask%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following three distinct strings are involved with the MaskedTextProvider class.
trans-unit.target: 与 MaskedTextProvider 类涉及以下三个不同的字符串。

trans-unit.source: |String name|Description| |-----------------|-----------------| |Input character or string|Represents the characters used as input that the mask is applied against.
trans-unit.target: |字符串名称 |说明 | |-----------------|-----------------| |输入的字符或字符串 |表示用作该蒙板应用针对的输入的字符。

trans-unit.source: In actuality, the input string may be composed of multiple input operations, including <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Add%2A>, <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Replace%2A>, <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.InsertAt%2A>, and <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Remove%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 在现实中，输入的字符串可能组合的多个输入的操作，包括<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Add%2A>， <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Replace%2A>， <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.InsertAt%2A>，和<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Remove%2A>。</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Remove%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.InsertAt%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Replace%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Add%2A>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, the input string cannot be accessed directly.
trans-unit.target: 因此，不能直接访问输入的字符串。

trans-unit.source: However, aspects of the input string handling are available though the <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.AllowPromptAsInput%2A> and <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.AsciiOnly%2A>, <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.ResetOnPrompt%2A>, and <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.ResetOnSpace%2A> properties.| |Mask|Represents the input formatting mask used to transform the input string into the formatted string.
trans-unit.target: 输入的字符串处理方面但是，但是也可用<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.AllowPromptAsInput%2A>和<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.AsciiOnly%2A>， <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.ResetOnPrompt%2A>，和<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.ResetOnSpace%2A>属性。 | |掩码 |表示的输入格式掩码，用于将输入的字符串转换为带格式的字符串。</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.ResetOnSpace%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.ResetOnPrompt%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.AsciiOnly%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.AllowPromptAsInput%2A>

trans-unit.source: This string is set in the <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.%23ctor%2A> and accessed primarily though the <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Mask%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 在中设置此字符串<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.%23ctor%2A>和但主要访问<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Mask%2A>属性。</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Mask%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: Characteristics of the mask are also available through other members, such as the <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Length%2A>, <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.PasswordChar%2A>, and <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.PromptChar%2A> properties.| |Formatted string|Represents the string that results when the full mask is applied to the input string.
trans-unit.target: 掩码的特征，还提供其他成员，例如<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Length%2A>，通过<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.PasswordChar%2A>，和<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.PromptChar%2A>属性。 | |格式字符串 |表示生成完整的掩码应用于输入字符串时的字符串。</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.PromptChar%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.PasswordChar%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Length%2A>

trans-unit.source: The formatted string can be queried with many members of the class, including <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Item%2A>, <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Length%2A>, <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.LastAssignedPosition%2A>, <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.MaskFull%2A>, <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.MaskCompleted%2A>, <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.FindEditPositionFrom%2A>, and so on.
trans-unit.target: 带格式的字符串可以查询具有很多成员的类，包括<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Item%2A>， <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Length%2A>， <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.LastAssignedPosition%2A>， <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.MaskFull%2A>， <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.MaskCompleted%2A>， <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.FindEditPositionFrom%2A>，依次类推。</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.FindEditPositionFrom%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.MaskCompleted%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.MaskFull%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.LastAssignedPosition%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Length%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Item%2A>

trans-unit.source: The full value of the formatted string is available from the <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.ToDisplayString%2A> and <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.ToString%2A> methods.| > [!NOTE] > The input string may represent direct user input, as in the case of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox>, or may be generated by other processes not directly associated with user input/output operations.
trans-unit.target: 格式化字符串的全部价值是可从<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.ToDisplayString%2A>和<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.ToString%2A>方法。 | &1;> [!NOTE]&1;> 输入的字符串可能表示直接用户输入，如下所示的大小写<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox>，也可能由其他进程不直接与用户输入/输出操作来生成。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox> </xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.ToString%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.ToDisplayString%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider"></xref> class using the specified mask, culture, prompt usage value, prompt character, password character, and ASCII restriction value.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider"></xref>类使用指定的掩码、 区域性、 用法提示值、 提示字符、 密码字符和 ASCII 限制值。

trans-unit.source: This constructor represents the most general overloaded form.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数表示最常见的重载的形式。

trans-unit.source: The `mask` parameter must conform to the masking language defined by the <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider> class, which is detailed in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.Mask%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox> class.
trans-unit.target: `mask`参数必须符合的屏蔽语言定义的<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider>类，其中详细介绍了<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.Mask%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox>类。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.Mask%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider>

trans-unit.source: Because neutral cultures cannot be queried for culture-specific information, the <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.%23ctor%2A> constructor will use the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.GetCultures%2A> method to search for the first non-neutral culture to use to determine the proper separator characters.
trans-unit.target: 因为非特定区域性无法查询有关特定于区域性的信息，<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.%23ctor%2A>构造函数将使用<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.GetCultures%2A>方法搜索要使用来确定适当的分隔符字符的第一个非特定于区域性。</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.GetCultures%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that represents the input mask.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.String>，表示输入的掩码。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> that is used to set region-sensitive separator characters.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>用于设置区域区分分隔符字符。</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Boolean> value that specifies whether the prompt character should be allowed as a valid input character.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Boolean>值，该值指定提示字符是否应允许作为有效的输入字符。</xref:System.Boolean>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Char> that will be displayed as a placeholder for user input.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Char>，将显示为用户输入的占位符。</xref:System.Char>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Char> that will be displayed for characters entered into a password string.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Char>，将显示输入的密码字符串的字符。</xref:System.Char>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to restrict input to ASCII-compatible characters; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to allow the entire Unicode set.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要将输入限制为 ASCII 兼容字符;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>以允许整个 Unicode 字符集。

trans-unit.source: The mask parameter is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> or <xref:System.String.Empty>.
trans-unit.target: 掩码参数是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>或<xref:System.String.Empty>。</xref:System.String.Empty>

trans-unit.source: -or- The mask contains one or more non-printable characters.
trans-unit.target: -或者-掩码包含一个或多个非打印字符。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified input character to the end of the formatted string.
trans-unit.target: 格式化字符串的末尾添加指定的输入的字符。

trans-unit.source: The Add method adds the `input` character value to the first available position in the formatted string after the position that was last assigned, which is represented by the <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.LastAssignedPosition%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Add 方法将添加`input`字符在格式化字符串的第一个可用位置的值最后一个被赋值，表示在位置后<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.LastAssignedPosition%2A>属性。</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.LastAssignedPosition%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method will fail for any of the following reasons: - The input value, `input`, is not printable, or it does not match its corresponding mask element.
trans-unit.target: 此方法将任何由于以下原因失败:-输入的值， `input`，不是可打印，或与掩码的对应元素不匹配。

trans-unit.source: - There are zero available edit positions in the formatted string, or there are no available edit positions after the last assigned position.
trans-unit.target: -有零个可用的编辑位置在格式化字符串，或者没有任何可用的编辑位置后最后分配位置。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Char> value to be appended to the formatted string.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Char>要追加到格式化的字符串值。</xref:System.Char>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the input character was added successfully; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果成功，则添加到输入的字符否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Adds the characters in the specified input string to the end of the formatted string.
trans-unit.target: 指定的输入字符串中字符都添加到末尾的格式化字符串中。

trans-unit.source: The Add method adds the characters from the `input` string to the formatted string, starting with the first available position after <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.LastAssignedPosition%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Add 方法将添加从字符`input`到格式化的字符串，并从<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.LastAssignedPosition%2A>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.LastAssignedPosition%2A>的第一个可用位置开始的字符串

trans-unit.source: This method will fail for any of the following reasons: - Any of the characters in the input value, `input`, are not printable, or the input value does not match its corresponding mask element.
trans-unit.target: 此方法将任何由于以下原因失败:-任何在输入的值中，字符`input`，是不可打印或输入的值与掩码的对应元素不匹配。

trans-unit.source: - There are not enough available edit positions in the formatted string after the last assigned position.
trans-unit.target: -没有足够可用的编辑位置带格式的字符串中最后一个分配位置后。

trans-unit.source: If this method fails, no additions are made and the method returns `false`.

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified input character to the end of the formatted string, and then outputs position and descriptive information.

trans-unit.source: The Add method attempts to add the `input` character value to the first available position in the formatted string after the position that was last assigned, which is represented by the <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.LastAssignedPosition%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Add 方法尝试将添加`input`字符在格式化字符串的第一个可用位置的值最后一个被赋值，表示在位置后<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.LastAssignedPosition%2A>属性。</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.LastAssignedPosition%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method will fail if all available positions are before the last assigned position.
trans-unit.target: 如果所有可用位置的最后一个分配位置之前，此方法将失败。

trans-unit.source: This method will fail for any of the following reasons: - The input value, `input`, is not printable, or it does not match its corresponding mask element.
trans-unit.target: 此方法将任何由于以下原因失败:-输入的值， `input`，不是可打印，或与掩码的对应元素不匹配。

trans-unit.source: - There are zero available edit positions in the formatted string, or there are no available edit positions after the last assigned position.
trans-unit.target: -有零个可用的编辑位置在格式化字符串，或者没有任何可用的编辑位置后最后分配位置。

trans-unit.source: This method functions the same as the overridden version taking a single <xref:System.Char> parameter, <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Add%28System.Char%29>, except that it outputs additional information.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the prompt character should be treated as a valid input character or not.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值表示是否提示字符或不应视为有效的输入字符。

trans-unit.source: The AllowPromptAsInput property's value is set in the <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 设置 AllowPromptAsInput 属性的值<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.%23ctor%2A>构造函数。</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: Even when AllowPromptAsInput is `true`, the prompt character must be valid for the current location in the mask in order to be accepted.
trans-unit.target: 甚至 AllowPromptAsInput 时`true`，才能被接受的提示字符必须是有效的掩码中的当前位置。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the user can enter <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.PromptChar*> into the control; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果用户可以输入<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.PromptChar*>到控件; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.PromptChar*>

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the mask accepts characters outside of the ASCII character set.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示掩码是否接受外部 ASCII 字符集的字符。

trans-unit.source: The AsciiOnly property's value is set in the <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 设置 AsciiOnly 属性的值<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.%23ctor%2A>构造函数。</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: If `true`, AsciiOnly restricts user input to the ASCII character set.
trans-unit.target: 如果`true`，AsciiOnly 限制于 ASCII 字符集的用户输入。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if only ASCII is accepted; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if <xref href="System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider"></xref> can accept any arbitrary Unicode character.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果仅接受 ASCII;<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>如果<xref href="System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider"></xref>可以接受任何任意的 Unicode 字符。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of editable character positions that have already been successfully assigned an input value.
trans-unit.target: 获取已成功分配的输入的值的可编辑的字符位置数。

trans-unit.source: The total number of editable character positions, represented by the <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.EditPositionCount%2A> property, should equal the sum of the AssignedEditPositionCount and the <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.AvailableEditPositionCount%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 可编辑的字符位置，由表示总数<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.EditPositionCount%2A>属性，应等于 AssignedEditPositionCount 总数和<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.AvailableEditPositionCount%2A>属性。</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.AvailableEditPositionCount%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.EditPositionCount%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Int32> containing the number of editable character positions in the input mask that have already been assigned a character value in the formatted string.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Int32>包含的输入掩码中已分配的格式化字符串中的字符值的可编辑的字符位置数。</xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of editable character positions in the input mask that have not yet been assigned an input value.
trans-unit.target: 获取输入掩码中尚未分配的输入的值的可编辑的字符位置的数。

trans-unit.source: The total number of editable character positions, represented by the <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.EditPositionCount%2A> property, should equal the sum of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.AssignedEditPositionCount%2A> and the AvailableEditPositionCount properties.
trans-unit.target: 可编辑的字符位置，由表示总数<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.EditPositionCount%2A>属性，应等于的总和<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.AssignedEditPositionCount%2A>和 AvailableEditPositionCount 属性。</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.AssignedEditPositionCount%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.EditPositionCount%2A>

trans-unit.target: 清除所有可编辑格式字符串，将替换为提示字符输入的字符。

trans-unit.source: The Clear method reinitializes the formatted string, inserting the prompt character into all editable positions.
trans-unit.target: Clear 方法重新初始化格式的字符串，将插入所有可编辑的位置的提示字符。

trans-unit.source: Clears all the editable input characters from the formatted string, replacing them with prompt characters, and then outputs descriptive information.
trans-unit.target: 清除从格式字符串，将替换为提示字符的所有可编辑输入的字符，然后将输出描述性信息。

trans-unit.source: The Clear method reinitializes the formatted string, inserting the prompt character into all editable positions.
trans-unit.target: Clear 方法重新初始化格式的字符串，将插入所有可编辑的位置的提示字符。

trans-unit.source: It functions equivalently to the overridden version that takes no parameters, <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Clear>, except it outputs additional information.
trans-unit.target: 它实现此目的函数没有采用任何参数的重写版本<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Clear>，只是它输出其他信息。</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Clear>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextResultHint"></xref> that succinctly describes the result of the operation.

trans-unit.target: Clone 方法返回当前<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider>的新副本

trans-unit.source: Gets the culture that determines the value of the localizable separators and placeholders in the input mask.
trans-unit.target: 获取确定可本地化的分隔符和输入掩码中的占位符的值的区域性。

trans-unit.source: The Culture property is set in the <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 在中设置的区域性属性<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.%23ctor%2A>构造函数。</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> containing the culture information associated with the input mask.

trans-unit.source: Gets the default password character used obscure user input.
trans-unit.target: 获取默认密码使用字符晦涩用户输入。

trans-unit.source: The DefaultPasswordChar property is defined in the <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider> class to be the asterisk character (*).
trans-unit.target: 中定义 DefaultPasswordChar 属性<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider>星号 （*） 的类。</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Char> that represents the default password character.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Char>表示默认的密码字符。</xref:System.Char>

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of editable positions in the formatted string.
trans-unit.target: 获取格式化字符串中的可编辑位置的数。

trans-unit.source: The total number of editable character positions, represented by the EditPositionCount property, must equal the sum of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.AssignedEditPositionCount%2A> and the <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.AvailableEditPositionCount%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 可编辑的字符位置，由 EditPositionCount 属性表示的总数必须等于的总和<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.AssignedEditPositionCount%2A>和<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.AvailableEditPositionCount%2A>属性。</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.AvailableEditPositionCount%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.AssignedEditPositionCount%2A>

trans-unit.source: This value includes both the required and the optional editable characters.
trans-unit.target: 此值包括必需和可选的可编辑字符。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Int32> containing the number of editable positions in the formatted string.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Int32>包含的格式化字符串中的可编辑位置数。</xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: Gets a newly created enumerator for the editable positions in the formatted string.
trans-unit.target: 在格式化字符串中可编辑的位置获取新创建的枚举器。

trans-unit.source: On every access of the EditPositions property, a temporary collection of editable positions is created that the retrieved <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> operates on.
trans-unit.target: 每次访问 EditPositions 属性，临时的可编辑的位置创建集合，用于检索<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>进行操作。</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>

trans-unit.source: This collection is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 此集合是只读的。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> that supports enumeration over the editable positions in the formatted string.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>，支持通过在格式化字符串中可编辑的位置的枚举。</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>

trans-unit.source: Returns the position of the first assigned editable position after the specified position using the specified search direction.
trans-unit.target: 返回使用指定的搜索方向的指定位置之后分配可编辑的位置的第一个位置。

trans-unit.source: The formatted string is composed of editable characters and literals copied from the mask.
trans-unit.target: 带格式的字符串组成的可编辑字符和文本复制从掩码。

trans-unit.source: The editable character positions will either be occupied by the prompt character copied from the mask if they are unassigned, or with a valid input character if they have been assigned an input.
trans-unit.target: 复制从掩码如果它们未分配，或有效的输入字符，如果他们已被分配一个输入的提示字符或者将占用可编辑的字符位置。

trans-unit.source: The FindAssignedEditPositionFrom method is used to search for the first assigned character after a specified position and search direction.
trans-unit.target: FindAssignedEditPositionFrom 方法用于分配的第一个字符在搜索后指定的位置和搜索方向。

trans-unit.source: The result can subsequently be passed as a parameter to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Item%2A> indexer to obtain the assigned value at this position.
trans-unit.target: 结果随后可作为参数传递<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Item%2A>索引器以获取在此位置上所赋的值。</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Item%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.FindNonEditPositionFrom%2A> and <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.FindUnassignedEditPositionFrom%2A> methods are complements of this method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.FindNonEditPositionFrom%2A>和<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.FindUnassignedEditPositionFrom%2A>方法都是此方法的补充。</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.FindUnassignedEditPositionFrom%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.FindNonEditPositionFrom%2A>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based position in the formatted string to start the search.
trans-unit.target: 要开始搜索的格式化字符串中的从零开始位置。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Boolean> indicating the search direction; either <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to search forward or <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to search backward.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Boolean>，该值指示搜索方向; 两个<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>向前搜索或<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>向后搜索。</xref:System.Boolean>

trans-unit.source: If successful, an <xref:System.Int32> representing the zero-based position of the first assigned editable position encountered; otherwise <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.InvalidIndex*>.
trans-unit.target: 如果成功，<xref:System.Int32>表示的从零开始的第一个位置分配可编辑位置遇到; 否则为<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.InvalidIndex*>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.InvalidIndex*> </xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: Returns the position of the first assigned editable position between the specified positions using the specified search direction.
trans-unit.target: 返回第一个分配可编辑位置之间使用指定的搜索方向的指定位置的位置。

trans-unit.source: The formatted string is composed of editable characters and literals copied from the mask.
trans-unit.target: 带格式的字符串组成的可编辑字符和文本复制从掩码。

trans-unit.source: The editable character positions will either be occupied by the prompt character copied from the mask if they are unassigned, or with a valid input character if they have been assigned an input.
trans-unit.target: 复制从掩码如果它们未分配，或有效的输入字符，如果他们已被分配一个输入的提示字符或者将占用可编辑的字符位置。

trans-unit.source: The FindAssignedEditPositionInRange method is used to search for the first assigned character between two specified positions, inclusive, using the specified search direction.
trans-unit.target: FindAssignedEditPositionInRange 方法用于搜索之间 （含），通过使用指定的搜索方向的两个指定位置的第一个分配字符。

trans-unit.source: The result can subsequently be passed as a parameter to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Item%2A> indexer to obtain the assigned value at this position.
trans-unit.target: 结果随后可作为参数传递<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Item%2A>索引器以获取在此位置上所赋的值。</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Item%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.FindNonEditPositionInRange%2A> and <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.FindUnassignedEditPositionInRange%2A> methods are complements of this method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.FindNonEditPositionInRange%2A>和<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.FindUnassignedEditPositionInRange%2A>方法都是此方法的补充。</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.FindUnassignedEditPositionInRange%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.FindNonEditPositionInRange%2A>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based position in the formatted string where the search starts.
trans-unit.target: 格式化字符串中开始搜索的位置从零开始。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based position in the formatted string where the search ends.

trans-unit.source: The formatted string is composed of editable characters and literals copied from the mask.
trans-unit.target: 带格式的字符串组成的可编辑字符和文本复制从掩码。

trans-unit.source: The editable character positions will either be occupied by the prompt character copied from the mask if they are unassigned, or with a valid input character if they have been assigned an input.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified <xref href="System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextResultHint"></xref> denotes success or failure.
trans-unit.target: 确定是否指定<xref href="System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextResultHint"></xref>表示成功或失败。

trans-unit.source: The following methods of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider> class contain a parameter of type <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextResultHint> that is used to output information about the operation of the method: <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Add%2A>, <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Clear%2A>, <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.InsertAt%2A>, <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Remove%2A>, <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.RemoveAt%2A>, <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Replace%2A>, <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Set%2A>, <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.VerifyChar%2A>, and <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.VerifyString%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 以下的方法<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider>类包含类型的参数<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextResultHint>用于输出有关操作的方法的信息︰ <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Add%2A>， <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Clear%2A>， <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.InsertAt%2A>， <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Remove%2A>， <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.RemoveAt%2A>， <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Replace%2A>， <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Set%2A>， <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.VerifyChar%2A>，和<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.VerifyString%2A>。</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.VerifyString%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.VerifyChar%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Set%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Replace%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.RemoveAt%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Remove%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.InsertAt%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Clear%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Add%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextResultHint> </xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider>

trans-unit.source: The GetOperationResultFromHint method interprets this value and returns a Boolean value that indicates whether the <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextResultHint> has signaled that the operation was a success or failure.
trans-unit.target: GetOperationResultFromHint 方法会将解释此值并返回一个布尔值，该值指示是否<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextResultHint>已发出信号进行的操作是成功还是失败。</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextResultHint>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextResultHint"></xref> value typically obtained as an output parameter from a previous operation.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextResultHint"> </xref>通常作为输出参数从上一个操作获取值。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified <xref href="System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextResultHint"></xref> value represents a success; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if it represents failure.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果指定<xref href="System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextResultHint"></xref>值表示成功; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>如果它表示失败。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether literal characters in the input mask should be included in the formatted string.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否应在格式化字符串中包含输入掩码中的原义字符。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.IncludePrompt%2A> and IncludeLiterals properties will determine whether prompt and literal characters appear when calling the <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.ToString%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.IncludePrompt%2A>IncludeLiterals 属性将确定调用时是否出现提示和原义字符和<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.ToString%2A>方法。</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.ToString%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.IncludePrompt%2A>

trans-unit.source: By setting both of these properties to `false`, the parsed string will represent only the characters entered by the user.
trans-unit.target: 通过设置这两种属性到`false`，分析的字符串将表示用户输入的字符。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if literals are included; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果文本包括;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.PromptChar*> is used to represent the absence of user input when displaying the formatted string.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.PromptChar*>用于表示用户输入显示带格式的字符串时不存在。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.PromptChar*>

trans-unit.source: The IncludePrompt and <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.IncludeLiterals%2A> properties will determine whether prompt and literal characters appear when calling the <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.ToString%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: IncludePrompt 和<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.IncludeLiterals%2A>属性将确定提示和原义字符出现在调用时<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.ToString%2A>方法。</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.ToString%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.IncludeLiterals%2A>

trans-unit.source: By setting both of these properties to `false`, the parsed string will represent only the characters entered by the user.
trans-unit.target: 通过设置这两种属性到`false`，分析的字符串将表示用户输入的字符。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the prompt character is used to represent the positions where no user input was provided; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果提示字符用于表示其中不需要用户输入; 如果提供了的位置否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Inserts the specified character at the specified position within the formatted string.
trans-unit.target: 在格式化字符串中指定的位置插入指定的字符。

trans-unit.source: The InsertAt method inserts a character into the first edit position at or beyond that specified by the `pos` parameter.
trans-unit.target: InsertAt 方法将一个字符插入到达到或超过指定的第一个编辑位置`pos`参数。

trans-unit.source: This method will shift all existing characters after the insertion point over by one position to make room for the inserted `input` character.
trans-unit.target: 此方法将移动现有的所有字符，将插入点移动一个位置，以便腾出空间供插入之后`input`字符。

trans-unit.source: If one of the following errors occurs, the insertion is not performed, and the method returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果发生以下错误之一，则不执行插入操作，并且该方法返回`false`。

trans-unit.source: - The `pos` parameter is less than zero or greater than the <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Length%2A> of the formatted string.
trans-unit.target: -`pos`参数小于零或大于<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Length%2A>的格式化字符串。</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Length%2A>

trans-unit.source: - An editable character was not found in the formatted string at or beyond the specified position, `pos`.
trans-unit.target: 的达到或超过指定的位置的格式化字符串中找不到可编辑的字符`pos`。

trans-unit.source: - The insertion character, `input`, is not a valid input character because it is not printable or does not match its corresponding mask element.
trans-unit.target: -插入字符， `input`，不是有效的输入的字符，因为它不是可打印或与掩码的对应元素不匹配。

trans-unit.source: - There are no available positions to the right of the insertion point, so that existing characters cannot be shifted.
trans-unit.target: -是插入点，右侧没有可用的位置，因此不能移动现有的字符。

trans-unit.source: - Shifting the existing characters would produce a violation of the mask.
trans-unit.target: -移动现有的字符会产生与掩码的冲突。

trans-unit.source: An empty `input` string will cause no change in the formatted string, but will return `true`.
trans-unit.target: 一个空`input`字符串将导致没有更改中的格式化字符串，但会返回`true`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Char> to be inserted.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Char>要插入。</xref:System.Char>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based position in the formatted string to insert the character.
trans-unit.target: 中要插入字符的格式化字符串的从零开始的位置。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the insertion was successful; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果插入成功;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Inserts the specified string at a specified position within the formatted string.
trans-unit.target: 在格式化字符串内的指定位置插入指定的字符串。

trans-unit.source: The InsertAt method inserts each character from the `input` string into the edit positions located at position `pos` and beyond.
trans-unit.target: InsertAt 方法将从每个字符插入`input`字符串插入编辑位置位于位置`pos`甚至更高。

trans-unit.source: This method will shift all existing characters after the insertion point over by one position for each inserted character.
trans-unit.target: 插入点移动一个位置，每个插入字符后，此方法将移动现有的所有字符。

trans-unit.source: If one of the following errors occurs, no insertion is performed, and the method returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果发生以下错误之一，不会执行插入，并且该方法返回`false`。

trans-unit.source: - The `pos` parameter is less than zero or greater than the <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Length%2A> of the formatted string.
trans-unit.target: -`pos`参数小于零或大于<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Length%2A>的格式化字符串。</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Length%2A>

trans-unit.source: - Not enough editable characters exist in the formatted string at or beyond the specified position, `pos`, to insert all of the characters from the `input` string.
trans-unit.target: 的格式化字符串达到或超过指定的位置中存在没有足够的可编辑字符`pos`，无法插入所有的字符`input`字符串。

trans-unit.source: - One or more of the insertion characters are not a valid input character because they are not printable or do not match their corresponding mask element.
trans-unit.target: 一个或多个插入字符不是有效的输入的字符因为它们是不可打印的或与其相应的掩码元素不匹配。

trans-unit.source: - There are not enough available positions to the right of the insertion point, so that existing characters cannot be shifted.
trans-unit.target: -没有足够的可用位置右侧的插入点，以便能移动现有的字符。

trans-unit.source: - Shifting the existing characters would produce a violation of the mask.
trans-unit.target: -移动现有的字符会产生与掩码的冲突。

trans-unit.source: Note that this shifting occurs during the insertion of each individual character.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，都会发生此移动的每个单个字符插入期间。

trans-unit.source: An empty `input` string will cause no change in the formatted string, but will return `true`.
trans-unit.target: 一个空`input`字符串将导致没有更改中的格式化字符串，但会返回`true`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.String> to be inserted.

trans-unit.source: Gets the upper bound of the range of invalid indexes.
trans-unit.target: 获取的无效索引范围的上限。

trans-unit.source: The InvalidIndex property is used to represent a result that is not valid for indexing operations, such as the <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.LastAssignedPosition%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: InvalidIndex 属性用于表示无效的索引操作，如结果<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.LastAssignedPosition%2A>方法。</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.LastAssignedPosition%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you use the provider or implement your own, you should use this property to decide if an index is invalid, rather than hard-coding knowledge of invalid values.
trans-unit.target: 当你使用的提供程序，或实现你自己时，应使用此属性以确定索引是否无效，而不是硬编码得知无效值。

trans-unit.source: A value representing the largest invalid index, as determined by the provider implementation.
trans-unit.target: 表示由提供程序实现的最大无效的索引的值。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the lowest valid index is 0, this property will return -1.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果最小的有效索引为 0，则此属性将返回-1。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified position is available for assignment.
trans-unit.target: 确定指定的位置是否可用于分配。

trans-unit.source: The IsAvailablePosition method returns `true` only if all of the following conditions are true: - The `pos` parameter is within the bounds of the formatted string; that is, its value is greater than or equal to zero and less than the <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Length%2A> of the formatted string.
trans-unit.target: IsAvailablePosition 方法返回`true`仅当所有以下条件都为真:-`pos`参数格式的字符串的边界内; 即，其值是否大于或等于零且小于比<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Length%2A>的格式化字符串。</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Length%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The specified position is an editable character.
trans-unit.target: -指定的位置是可编辑的字符。

trans-unit.source: - A character has not already been assigned to this position.
trans-unit.target: -A 字符尚未分配到此位置。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based position in the mask to test.
trans-unit.target: 若要测试的掩码中的从零开始位置。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified position in the formatted string is editable and has not been assigned to yet; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果格式字符串中的指定的位置对其进行编辑，并且尚未分配到尚未;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified position is editable.
trans-unit.target: 确定指定的位置是否可编辑。

trans-unit.source: The IsEditPosition method returns `true` only if both of the following conditions are true: - The `pos` parameter is within the bounds of the formatted string; that is, its value is greater than or equal to zero and less than the <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Length%2A> of the formatted string.
trans-unit.target: IsEditPosition 方法返回`true`仅当两个以下条件均成立:-`pos`参数格式的字符串的边界内; 即，其值是否大于或等于零且小于比<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Length%2A>的格式化字符串。</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Length%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The specified position is an editable character.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that determines whether password protection should be applied to the formatted string.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，确定是否应将密码保护应用于格式化的字符串。

trans-unit.source: Password protection can be initiated using one of the following two ways: - Setting the <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.PasswordChar%2A> property to a non-`null` value.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用以下方法之一通过两种方式启动密码保护:-设置<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.PasswordChar%2A>属性为非`null`值。</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.PasswordChar%2A>

trans-unit.source: - Setting the IsPassword property to `true`., which also sets the <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.PasswordChar%2A> property to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.DefaultPasswordChar%2A> value.
trans-unit.target: -将 IsPassword 属性设置为`true`。，这还会设置<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.PasswordChar%2A>属性<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.DefaultPasswordChar%2A>值。</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.DefaultPasswordChar%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.PasswordChar%2A>

trans-unit.source: IsPassword is used by the <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.ToDisplayString%2A> and <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.ToString%2A> methods to determine whether to reveal the actual input characters or obscure them with <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.PasswordChar%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.ToDisplayString%2A>和<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.ToString%2A>方法来确定是否显示实际的输入的字符，或会将其与<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.PasswordChar%2A>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.PasswordChar%2A>覆盖</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.ToString%2A></xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.ToDisplayString%2A>使用 IsPassword

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the input string is to be treated as a password string; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果输入的字符串被视为密码字符串;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.target: 确定指定的字符是否为有效的输入的字符。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified character is a valid password character.
trans-unit.target: 确定指定的字符是否为有效的密码字符。

trans-unit.source: Valid password characters include all printable characters and the null character, which is used to disable password functionality.

trans-unit.source: Gets the element at the specified position in the formatted string.
trans-unit.target: 在格式化字符串中的指定位置获取的元素。

trans-unit.source: The Item property is the standard indexer for the <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider> class.
trans-unit.target: Item 属性是<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider>类</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider>的标准索引器

trans-unit.source: A zero-based index of the element to retrieve.

trans-unit.source: index is less than zero or greater than or equal to the of the mask.
trans-unit.target: index小于零或大于或等于的掩码。

trans-unit.source: Gets the index in the mask of the rightmost input character that has been assigned to the mask.
trans-unit.target: 最右边的输入字符的已分配给掩码掩码中获取的索引。

trans-unit.source: The LastAssignedPosition property represents the farthest edit position in the mask, relative to the origin, that has been assigned an input character.
trans-unit.target: LastAssignedPosition 属性表示最远的编辑将居的掩码，相对于源，已分配的输入的字符。

trans-unit.source: For languages read left-to-right (LTR), such as English, this is the rightmost assigned position; for languages read right-to-left (RTL), this would be the leftmost position.
trans-unit.target: 对于语言英语，如读取从左到右 (LTR)，这是最右边分配位置;对于读取右到左 (RTL) 的语言，这将是最左边的位置。

trans-unit.source: If at least one input character has been assigned to the mask, an <xref:System.Int32> containing the index of rightmost assigned position; otherwise, if no position has been assigned, <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.InvalidIndex*>.
trans-unit.target: 如果至少一个输入字符已被分配到<xref:System.Int32>包含该索引的最右边的分配位置; 否则，如果任何位置均不具有已分配， <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.InvalidIndex*>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.InvalidIndex*></xref:System.Int32>的掩码

trans-unit.source: Gets the length of the mask, absent any mask modifier characters.
trans-unit.target: 获取的掩码，不包括任何掩码长度修饰符字符。

trans-unit.source: The Length property represents the total number of characters in the mask, including both the literal and editable characters.
trans-unit.target: Length 属性表示掩码，包括文本，并可编辑字符中的字符的总数。

trans-unit.source: The number of literal characters can be determined by subtracting the value of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.EditPositionCount%2A> from the Length.
trans-unit.target: 可以通过减去的值确定的文本的字符数<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.EditPositionCount%2A>的长度。</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.EditPositionCount%2A>

trans-unit.source: Length also describes the length of the formatted string, including input characters, literals, and prompt characters.
trans-unit.target: 长度还介绍了格式的字符串，包括将输入的字符、 文本和提示字符的长度。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Int32> containing the number of positions in the mask, excluding characters that modify mask input.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Int32>包含的掩码，不包括修改掩码输入的字符中的位置数。</xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: Gets the input mask.
trans-unit.target: 获取输入的掩码。

trans-unit.source: The Mask property is set in the <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 在中设置掩码属性<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.%23ctor%2A>构造函数。</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: This mask must contain only valid characters as defined by the masking language.
trans-unit.target: 按照屏蔽语言定义，此掩码必须包含无效字符。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> containing the full mask.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.String>包含完整的掩码。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether all required inputs have been entered into the formatted string.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是否所有必需的输入都已输入到格式化的字符串。

trans-unit.source: The MaskCompleted property checks only required input elements.
trans-unit.target: MaskCompleted 属性检查仅必需的输入的元素。

trans-unit.source: To determine whether all required and optional input elements have been entered, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.MaskFull%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox> class instead.
trans-unit.target: 若要确定是否已输入所有必需和可选的输入的元素，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.MaskFull%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox>类。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.MaskFull%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The current value of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Mask%2A> property determines which formatting elements are considered required and which are optional.
trans-unit.target: 当前值<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Mask%2A>属性确定哪些格式设置的元素将被视为所需和可选。</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Mask%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if all required input has been entered into the mask; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果所有所需的输入已输入到掩码;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether all required and optional inputs have been entered into the formatted string.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是否所有的必需和可选输入都已输入到格式化的字符串。

trans-unit.source: To verify if only required input elements have been entered, use the <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.MaskCompleted%2A> property instead.
trans-unit.target: 若要验证是否仅输入的元素具有输入必需的使用<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.MaskCompleted%2A>属性改为。</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.MaskCompleted%2A>

trans-unit.source: The current value of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Mask%2A> property determines which formatting elements are considered required and which are optional.
trans-unit.target: 当前值<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Mask%2A>属性确定哪些格式设置的元素将被视为所需和可选。</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Mask%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if all required and optional inputs have been entered; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果所有必选和可选输入都已输入;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the character to be substituted for the actual input characters.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置要替换为实际的输入字符的字符。

trans-unit.source: For sensitive user input, it is common practice to conceal the actual information entered by the user during output operations.
trans-unit.target: 对于敏感的用户输入，它是常见的做法隐藏在输出操作期间由用户输入的实际信息。

trans-unit.source: If the PasswordChar property is set to a non-`null` character, output methods such as <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.ToDisplayString%2A> and <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.ToString%2A> will obscure the input characters with the specified password character.
trans-unit.target: 如果 PasswordChar 属性设置为非`null`字符，如输出方法<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.ToDisplayString%2A>和<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.ToString%2A>将会掩盖与指定的密码字符的输入的字符。</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.ToString%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.ToDisplayString%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting this property to `null` will disable password protection functionality.
trans-unit.target: 此属性设置为`null`将禁用密码保护功能。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Char> value used as the password character.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Char>用作密码字符的值。</xref:System.Char>

trans-unit.source: The password character specified when setting this property is the same as the current prompt character, <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.PromptChar*>.
trans-unit.target: 设置此属性时指定的密码字符等同于当前的提示字符<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.PromptChar*>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.PromptChar*>

trans-unit.source: The two are required to be different.
trans-unit.target: 两个必需不同。

trans-unit.source: The character specified when setting this property is not a valid password character, as determined by the <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.IsValidPasswordChar*> method.
trans-unit.target: 当设置此属性不是有效的密码字符，根据所指定的字符<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.IsValidPasswordChar*>方法。</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.IsValidPasswordChar*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the character used to represent the absence of user input for all available edit positions.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置用于表示缺少的所有可用的编辑位置的用户输入的字符。

trans-unit.source: The PromptChar property represents the prompt character that is used by the <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.ToDisplayString%2A> and <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.ToString%2A> methods to represent the current state of the formatted input string.
trans-unit.target: PromptChar 属性表示由提示字符<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.ToDisplayString%2A>和<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.ToString%2A>方法来表示格式化的输入字符串的当前状态。</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.ToString%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.ToDisplayString%2A>

trans-unit.source: A prompt character is placed in editable positions that have not yet been assigned an input value.
trans-unit.target: 提示字符被置于可编辑尚未分配的输入的值的位置。

trans-unit.source: Some versions of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.ToString%2A> method also depend on the value of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.IncludePrompt%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 某些版本的<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.ToString%2A>方法还依赖于的值<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.IncludePrompt%2A>属性。</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.IncludePrompt%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.ToString%2A>

trans-unit.source: The character used to prompt the user for input.
trans-unit.target: 用于提示用户输入的字符。

trans-unit.source: The default is an underscore (_).
trans-unit.target: 默认值为下划线 (_)。

trans-unit.source: The prompt character specified when setting this property is the same as the current password character, <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.PasswordChar*>.
trans-unit.target: 设置此属性时与当前的密码字符， <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.PasswordChar*>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.PasswordChar*>相同提示字符指定

trans-unit.source: The two are required to be different.
trans-unit.target: 两个必需不同。

trans-unit.source: The character specified when setting this property is not a valid password character, as determined by the <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.IsValidPasswordChar*> method.
trans-unit.target: 当设置此属性不是有效的密码字符，根据所指定的字符<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.IsValidPasswordChar*>方法。</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.IsValidPasswordChar*>

trans-unit.source: Removes the last assigned character from the formatted string.
trans-unit.target: 从带格式的字符串中删除最后一个分配的字符。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Remove%2A> method has no effect if there are no characters assigned to the mask yet.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Remove%2A>方法不起如果没有尚未分配要屏蔽的字符。</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Remove%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the last assigned character is removed from the formatted string, the editable mask character is reset for that position, allowing subsequent input.
trans-unit.target: 当从格式化字符串中删除最后一个分配的字符，则可编辑掩码字符为重置该位置，从而允许后续输入。

trans-unit.target: 原义字符不受此方法。

trans-unit.source: This method call is exactly equivalent to the following call to the overloaded <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.RemoveAt%28System.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%29> version: `RemoveAt(pos, pos);`

trans-unit.source: Replaces a single character at or beyond the specified position with the specified character value.

trans-unit.source: The Replace method searches for the first editable position in the formatted string at or beyond the specified position, `pos`.
trans-unit.target: Replace 方法将格式化字符串达到或超过指定的位置中的第一个可编辑位置搜索`pos`。

trans-unit.source: If one is found, the value of the editable position is changed to the specified character, `input`.

trans-unit.target: 以下任何条件将导致错误，导致执行不替换和的值`false`要返回:-`pos`参数小于零或大于<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Length%2A>的格式化字符串。</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Length%2A>

trans-unit.source: - An editable character was not found in the formatted string at or beyond the specified position, `pos`.
trans-unit.target: 的达到或超过指定的位置的格式化字符串中找不到可编辑的字符`pos`。

trans-unit.source: - The replacement character, `input`, is not a valid input character because it is not printable or does not match its corresponding mask element.
trans-unit.target: -替换字符， `input`，不是有效的输入的字符，因为它不是可打印或与掩码的对应元素不匹配。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that determines how an input character that matches the prompt character should be handled.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，确定应如何处理与提示字符匹配的输入的字符。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider> can treat two categories of characters, paces and prompt characters, in a special manner.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider>以特殊方式，可以将两种类别的字符，空白字符和提示字符。</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider>

trans-unit.source: Normally, each input character will be tested against the mask and either accepted or rejected.
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下，将对照掩码并测试每个输入的字符接受或拒绝。

trans-unit.source: Operating on the assumption that the <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.PromptChar%2A> property is set to a value other than `null`, then setting the ResetOnPrompt property to `true` will result in special processing for the prompt character.
trans-unit.target: 假定在<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.PromptChar%2A>属性设置为值`null`，然后将 ResetOnPrompt 属性设置为`true`将导致对提示字符特殊处理。</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.PromptChar%2A>

trans-unit.source: When a prompt character is added, it causes the current mask character position to be cleared and the current position to be advanced to the next editable character.
trans-unit.target: 添加提示字符，它会导致要清除的当前掩码字符位置和当前位置，以推进到下一个可编辑的字符。

trans-unit.source: ResetOnPrompt takes precedence over the <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.AllowPromptAsInput%2A> property as described in the following table.
trans-unit.target: ResetOnPrompt 优先于<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.AllowPromptAsInput%2A>下表中所述的属性。</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.AllowPromptAsInput%2A>

trans-unit.source: The default.| |`true`|`false`|The prompt character can be added and it causes the current mask position to be reset.| |`false`|`true`|The prompt character is processed as a normal input character.| |`false`|`false`|The prompt character is not valid and methods attempting to add the character will fail.|
trans-unit.target: 默认值。 | |`true`|`false`|可以添加提示字符，并且它将导致当前的掩码位置，要重置。 | |`false`|`true`|提示字符被处理为普通的输入字符。 | |`false`|`false`|提示字符无效，尝试将字符添加的方法将会失败。 |

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the prompt character entered as input causes the current editable position in the mask to be reset; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to indicate that the prompt character is to be processed as a normal input character.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果提示输入作为输入的字符会导致要重置; 的掩码中的当前可编辑位置否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>以指示提示字符作为正常的输入字符进行处理。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that determines how a space input character should be handled.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，确定应如何处理空白输入的字符。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider> can treat two categories of characters, spaces and prompt characters, in a special manner.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider>以特殊方式，可以将两种类别的字符、 空格和提示字符。</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider>

trans-unit.source: Normally, each input character will be tested against the mask and either accepted or rejected.
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下，将对照掩码并测试每个输入的字符接受或拒绝。

trans-unit.source: Setting the ResetOnSpace property to `true` will result in the current mask character position being cleared and the current position being advanced to the next editable character.
trans-unit.target: 将 ResetOnSpace 属性设置为`true`将导致要清除的当前掩码字符位置和当前推进到下一个可编辑的字符的位置。

trans-unit.source: ResetOnSpace is useful when assigning text that was saved excluding the prompt, where the prompt is replaced with a space.
trans-unit.target: ResetOnSpace 时非常有用将文本分配已保存排除出现提示时，其中提示符将被替换为空格。

trans-unit.source: Before restoring such a string, setting ResetOnSpace to `true` will reset the prompt characters at the positions occupied by spaces in the input string.
trans-unit.target: 还原此类字符串，将 ResetOnSpace 设置为之前`true`将重置占用输入字符串中的空格的位置的提示字符。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the space input character causes the current editable position in the mask to be reset; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to indicate that it is to be processed as a normal input character.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果空白输入的字符导致要重置; 的掩码中的当前可编辑位置否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>以指示它是要作为正常的输入字符进行处理。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Sets the formatted string to the specified input string.
trans-unit.target: 将带格式的字符串设置为指定的输入字符串。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Set%2A> method clears the existing contents of the formatted string and then applies the mask against the `input` string to update the contents of the formatted string.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Set%2A>方法清除现有的格式化字符串的内容，然后将应用针对的掩码`input`要更新的内容格式的字符串的字符串。</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Set%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following conditions are considered errors.
trans-unit.target: 以下情况被视为错误。

trans-unit.source: When an error occurs, the formatted string remains unaltered and <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Set%2A> returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: 格式化的字符串时出错，则保持不变并<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Set%2A>返回`false`。</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Set%2A>

trans-unit.source: - There are not enough editable positions in the formatted string to hold the contents of the replacement string.
trans-unit.target: -没有足够存放的替换字符串内容的格式化字符串中可编辑的位置。

trans-unit.source: - One of the replacement character values is not valid because it is not printable or does not match its corresponding mask element.
trans-unit.target: -之一替换字符值无效因为它不是可打印或与掩码的对应元素不匹配。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether literal character positions in the mask can be overwritten by their same values.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否可以通过其相同的值覆盖掩码中的原义字符位置。

trans-unit.source: Input masks can contain literal and editable characters.
trans-unit.target: 输入的掩码可以包含文本，并可编辑的字符。

trans-unit.source: If an attempt is made to add an input character to the position in a mask occupied by a literal, the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.SkipLiterals%2A> property determines the result.
trans-unit.target: 如果尝试添加为文本、 的值所占据的掩码中的位置的输入的字符<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.SkipLiterals%2A>属性确定结果。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.SkipLiterals%2A>

trans-unit.source: - If this property is `true`, it is valid to overwrite a literal with the same value when adding input characters.
trans-unit.target: -如果此属性是`true`，可使用相同的值覆盖原义，添加将输入的字符时。

trans-unit.source: For example, a forward slash character value, `'/'`, could be added to the third position of the mask `"00/00/000"`.
trans-unit.target: 例如，正斜杠字符值`'/'`，无法添加到掩码的第三个位置`"00/00/000"`。

trans-unit.source: - If this property is `false`, it is not valid to assign any value to a mask position occupied by a literal character.
trans-unit.target: -如果此属性是`false`，所以不能将任何值分配给由原义字符占据的掩码位置。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to allow literals to be added back; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to not allow the user to overwrite literal characters.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要允许文本，添加回去;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>为不允许用户覆盖原义字符。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Returns the formatted string in a displayable form.
trans-unit.target: 返回可显示的窗体中的带格式的字符串。

trans-unit.source: The ToDisplayString method will always include prompt and literal characters in the return value, regardless of the value of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.IncludePrompt%2A> or <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.IncludeLiterals%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: ToDisplayString 方法将始终包含返回值，而不考虑的值中的提示和原义字符<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.IncludePrompt%2A>或<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.IncludeLiterals%2A>属性。</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.IncludeLiterals%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.IncludePrompt%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method will always display password characters if the <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.PasswordChar%2A> property is set to a character value other than `null`.
trans-unit.target: 此方法将始终显示密码字符如果<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.PasswordChar%2A>属性设置为字符值`null`。</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.PasswordChar%2A>

trans-unit.source: ToDisplayString is commonly used to obtain the string to display in associated user interface elements, such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox>.
trans-unit.target: ToDisplayString 通常用于获取要在关联的用户界面元素，如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox>中显示的字符串

trans-unit.source: ToString performs the following actions when there are discrepancies in the input parameters: - If `startPos` is less than zero, the starting position is set to zero.
trans-unit.target: ToString 的输入参数中存在差异时，执行下列操作:-如果`startPos`小于零，起始位置设置为零。

trans-unit.source: - If `startPos` is greater than or equal to the actual <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Length%2A> of the formatted string, the <xref:System.String.Empty> string is returned.
trans-unit.target: -如果`startPos`大于或等于实际<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Length%2A>的格式字符串，<xref:System.String.Empty>返回字符串。</xref:System.String.Empty> </xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Length%2A>

trans-unit.source: - If `length` is greater than the remaining number of characters past the starting position, only the remaining characters are returned.
trans-unit.target: -如果`length`大于返回的剩余字符过去的起始位置，仅剩余字符数。

trans-unit.source: - If `length` is less than or equal to zero, the <xref:System.String.Empty> string is returned.
trans-unit.target: -如果`length`小于或等于零，<xref:System.String.Empty>返回字符串。</xref:System.String.Empty>

trans-unit.target: 要返回的字符数。

trans-unit.target: 此版本的重载<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.ToString%2A>方法返回子字符串的格式字符串，从位置开始`startPos`和包括的后续由指定的字符数`length`参数。</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.ToString%2A>

trans-unit.source: The returned string includes prompts and literals according to the current values of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.IncludePrompt%2A> and <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.IncludeLiterals%2A> properties, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 返回的字符串包含提示字符和文本的当前值根据<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.IncludePrompt%2A>和<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.IncludeLiterals%2A>属性，分别。</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.IncludeLiterals%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.IncludePrompt%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the `ignorePasswordChar` parameter is `true`, it will return the original input characters, ignoring the value of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.PasswordChar%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果`ignorePasswordChar`参数是`true`，它将返回原始的输入的字符，并忽略的值<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.PasswordChar%2A>属性。</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.PasswordChar%2A>

trans-unit.source: If this parameter is `false`, it will use the password character to obscure editable user input if the <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.PasswordChar%2A> property is set to a value other than `null`.
trans-unit.target: 如果此参数为`false`，它将使用的密码字符遮盖可编辑的用户输入，如果<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.PasswordChar%2A>属性设置为值`null`。</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.PasswordChar%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > Because this method potentially reveals information that is usually protected in the user interface by password characters, it should be used with extreme caution to avoid accidentally revealing sensitive user data.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!IMPORTANT]&1;> 由于此方法可能会显示在用户界面中通常由密码字符保护的信息，它应与要格外小心，以免意外泄漏敏感的用户数据。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.ToString%2A> performs the following actions when there are discrepancies in the input parameters: - If `startPos` is less than zero, the starting position is set to zero.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.ToString%2A>在输入参数有差异时，请执行下列操作:-如果`startPos`小于零，起始位置设置为零。</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.ToString%2A>

trans-unit.source: - If `startPos` is greater than or equal to the actual <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Length%2A> of the formatted string, the <xref:System.String.Empty> string is returned.
trans-unit.target: -如果`startPos`大于或等于实际<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Length%2A>的格式字符串，<xref:System.String.Empty>返回字符串。</xref:System.String.Empty> </xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.Length%2A>

trans-unit.source: - If `length` is greater than the remaining number of characters past the starting position, only the remaining characters are returned.
trans-unit.target: -如果`length`大于返回的剩余字符过去的起始位置，仅剩余字符数。

trans-unit.source: - If `length` is less than or equal to zero, the <xref:System.String.Empty> string is returned.
trans-unit.target: -如果`length`小于或等于零，<xref:System.String.Empty>返回字符串。</xref:System.String.Empty>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to return the actual editable characters; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to indicate that the <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.PasswordChar*> property is to be honored.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要返回的实际的可编辑字符;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> ，则指示<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.PasswordChar*>属性将会得到。</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.PasswordChar*>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based position in the formatted string where the output begins.
trans-unit.target: 格式化字符串中输出的开始处的位置从零开始。

trans-unit.source: The number of characters to return.
trans-unit.target: 要返回的字符数。

trans-unit.source: If successful, a substring of the formatted <xref:System.String>, which includes literals, prompts, and optionally password characters; otherwise the <xref:System.String> string.
trans-unit.target: 如果成功，带格式的子字符串<xref:System.String>，其中包括文本、 提示，以及 （可选） 密码字符; 否则为<xref:System.String>字符串。</xref:System.String> </xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Returns a substring of the formatted string, optionally including prompt and literal characters.
trans-unit.target: 返回子字符串的格式字符串，有选择性地包括提示和原义字符。

trans-unit.source: This version of the overloaded <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.ToString%2A> method returns a substring of the formatted string, starting at the position `startPos` and including the subsequent number of characters specified by the `length` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 此版本的重载<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.ToString%2A>方法返回子字符串的格式字符串，从位置开始`startPos`和包括的后续由指定的字符数`length`参数。</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.ToString%2A>

trans-unit.source: The return string includes prompts and literals according to the values of the `IncludePrompt` and `IncludeLiterals` parameters, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 返回的字符串包含提示字符和文本的值根据`IncludePrompt`和`IncludeLiterals`参数，分别。

trans-unit.source: Notice that these parameters override the values of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.IncludePrompt%2A><xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.IncludeLiterals%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 请注意这些参数重写的值<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.IncludePrompt%2A><xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.IncludeLiterals%2A>属性。</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.IncludeLiterals%2A></xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.IncludePrompt%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method will always return the original input characters, ignoring the value of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.PasswordChar%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 此方法将始终返回原始的输入的字符，并忽略的值<xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.PasswordChar%2A>属性。</xref:System.ComponentModel.MaskedTextProvider.PasswordChar%2A>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based position in the formatted string where the output begins.

trans-unit.source: The number of characters to return.
trans-unit.target: 要返回的字符数。

trans-unit.source: If successful, a substring of the formatted <xref:System.String>, which includes all the assigned character values and optionally includes literals, prompts, and password characters; otherwise the <xref:System.String> string.
